subsections.title: Iconic Landmarks & Photo Stops
highlights: Mormon Row – historic barns with Teton backdrop
Schwabacher Landing – sunrise photo hot spot
Oxbow Bend – reflections of Mount Moran
Signal Mountain Summit – panoramic view

subsections.title: Scenic Drives & Pullouts
highlights: Teton Park Road – from Moose to Jackson Lake Junction
Moose-Wilson Road – great for moose sightings
Jenny Lake Scenic Drive – loop with lake access
Highway 89/191/26 – eastern views of the Tetons

subsections.title: Hiking Trails by Difficulty
highlights: Easy: Taggart Lake Loop, Jenny Lake Loop, Hermitage Point
Moderate: Hidden Falls & Inspiration Point, Phelps Lake Overlook, Bradley-Taggart Loop
Strenuous: Cascade Canyon Trail, Paintbrush Canyon Loop, Static Peak Divide

subsections.title: Visitor Centers & Park Entrances
highlights: Moose Visitor Center – southern hub
Jenny Lake Visitor Center – trail access
Colter Bay Visitor Center – northern access
Flagg Ranch – connects to Yellowstone South Entrance

subsections.title: Wildlife Watching
highlights: Best times: dawn and dusk
Willow Flats Overlook – moose, elk
Oxbow Bend – bears and birds
Snake River corridor – common sightings

subsections.title: Family-Friendly Activities
highlights: Junior Ranger Program at visitor centers
Jenny Lake boat shuttle and Hidden Falls hike
Picnic areas at String Lake and Colter Bay
Educational signage and ranger programs

subsections.title: Boating, Fishing & Water Access
highlights: Jenny Lake – kayak and shuttle rentals
Jackson Lake – motorboats, marinas at Colter Bay
Snake River – rafting and float trips (permits required)

subsections.title: Seasonal Travel & Closures
highlights: Moose-Wilson Road closes during spring/fall for bear activity
Teton Park Road closed Nov–Apr to vehicles, open for skiing
Jenny Lake access varies by snowpack

subsections.title: Dining, Lodging & Camping
highlights: Lodges: Jackson Lake Lodge, Jenny Lake Lodge, Colter Bay Cabins
Dining: Signal Mountain Lodge diner, Dornan’s pizza deck
Campgrounds: Gros Ventre, Jenny Lake, Colter Bay, Lizard Creek

subsections.title: Loop Integration & Route Planning
highlights: Common routes from Jackson and Driggs into Yellowstone
Sunrise/sunset logic for wildlife and photo ops
Ideal for photographers, families, and kayak/hike combos
